body:

comments.author: BrucePay
comments.body: What do you mean by "implement lucene". The lucene library already exists (including Lucene.Net). It can be loaded  and used from PowerShell as is.

comments.author: jhoneill
comments.body:
On windows you can query the Windows Index. https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Get-IndexedItem/3.0.3
Get-IndexedItem 3.0.3
Queries the Windows Index using properties or Freetext searches

comments.author: jdhitsolutions
comments.body: I agree that this is already handled via a community contribution. There's no compelling reason for Microsoft to offer commands, especially as based on download numbers for @jhoneill's module (sorry James), there doesn't appear to be clamoring demand.
